message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early.
A slightly more balanced offer. Consider this one.
You're not getting a better offer from me, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but not too much. Consider this offer.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down yet. I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect much more.
